text: @GavinNewsom All that's going on is a slowing of the infection rate. You can't stop mother nature, the virus will win the day. so what's the point of destroying the economy at the same time when the inevitable is what will happen? It's time to reopen #California now. #COVID19 #EndTheShutdown
